trans-unit.source: {T}: Tear CARDNAME into pieces. Add four mana of any one color. Remove the pieces from the game.

trans-unit.resname: OLEP·48 | Mirror Mirror | Card Text | Paragraph 1
OLEP·48 | Mirror Mirror | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {7}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Choose target player. At the beginning of the next end step, exchange life totals with that player, exchange control of all permanents you and that player control, and exchange cards in your hands, cards in your libraries, and cards in your graveyards.
trans-unit.target: {7}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Choose target player. trans-unit.resname: OLEP·49 | Squirrel Farm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{G}: Reveal a card in your hand, covering the artist credit. Target opponent guesses the artist. If they guess wrong, create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token.
trans-unit.target: {1}{G}: Reveal a card in your hand, covering the artist credit. Target opponent guesses the artist. If they guess wrong, create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token.

OLEP·51 | Infernal Spawn of Evil | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}{B}, Reveal CARDNAME from your hand, Say "It's coming!": CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker. Activate only during your upkeep and only once each turn.
